Touch on a button that has text "Get Started"
Touch on a button that has text "Sync from AnkiWeb"
By touching the "Sync from AnkiWeb" button, the navigation drawer is opened, revealing additional options and information related to the AnkiDroid app and deck statistics.
Touch on a button that has content_desc "More options"
By touching the "More options" button, new options such as "Check," "Restore from backup," "Manage note types," "Import," and "Export" have been added to the screen in the DeckPicker section.
Touch on a button that has text "Manage note types"

By touching the "Manage note types" button, the user has navigated to the "ManageNoteTypes" screen where they can view and manage different note types, including options to edit, rename, and delete existing note types, as well as add new ones. (page changed from DeckPicker to ManageNotetypes)
